title: UnitedHealthcare CEO Killed
description: Brian Thompson, the CEO of UnitedHealth’s insurance unit, was fatally shot outside a Midtown Manhattan hotel in what police described as a “brazen” targeted attack by a gunman lying in wait for him. What do you think? The post UnitedHealthcare CEO Killed appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
excerpt: Brian Thompson, the CEO of UnitedHealth’s insurance unit, was fatally shot outside a Midtown Manhattan hotel in what police described as a “brazen” targeted attack by a gunman lying in wait for him. What do you think?
text: Brian Thompson, the CEO of UnitedHealth’s insurance unit, was fatally shot outside a Midtown Manhattan hotel in what police described as a “brazen” targeted attack by a gunman lying in wait for him. What do you think? “Yet another reason not to become too important at your job.” Elias Byne, Garlic Crusher “You come for our CEOs, you’re coming for all of us.” Muhammed Khalil, Bakery Consultant “Quick! Everyone get whatever surgery you need while they’re distracted!” Sophie Rudin, Espionage Trainee
html:
Brian Thompson, the CEO of UnitedHealth’s insurance unit, was fatally shot outside a Midtown Manhattan hotel in what police described as a “brazen” targeted attack by a gunman lying in wait for him. What do you think?

“Yet another reason not to become too important at your job.”

Elias Byne, Garlic Crusher

“You come for our CEOs, you’re coming for all of us.”

Muhammed Khalil, Bakery Consultant

“Quick! Everyone get whatever surgery you need while they’re distracted!”

Sophie Rudin, Espionage Trainee
